data.message: could someone please help me and my wife. have no where to turn to when it comes to this type of matter. we received a notice via face book about a very important matter and its to the point that we are very upset over the matter and would like to speak to someone that has a little pull around in face book. we are at the point if we are deciding to seek legal advice. could you give us someone to talk to to get this resolved and let us know if this notice is actually face book info we have received. please contact us through our face book page or via email at scottrollf@yahoo.com ASAP time is of importance.
